CustomField.formula: IF( OR( Active_Semester__r.Term_Number__c = 1, Active_Semester__r.Term_Number__c = 2 ), "1st Year", IF( OR( Active_Semester__r.Term_Number__c = 3, Active_Semester__r.Term_Number__c = 4 ), "2nd Year", IF( OR( Active_Semester__r.Term_Number__c = 5, Active_Semester__r.Term_Number__c = 6 ), "3rd Year", IF( OR( Active_Semester__r.Term_Number__c = 7, Active_Semester__r.Term_Number__c = 8 ), "4th Year", IF( OR( Active_Semester__r.Term_Number__c = 9, Active_Semester__r.Term_Number__c = 10 ), "5th Year", "" ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: for populating the current semesster year into the Student fee
CustomField.label: Current Year
